quote: In the fleeting light she saw the meadow, dotted with stunted hawthorns, their twisted limbs dense with red berries, and then a shape: achingly familiar, child-sized, shockingly still.
quote_letters: IN THE FLEETING LIGHT SHE SAW THE MEADOW DOTTED WITH STUNTED HAWTHORNS THEIR TWISTED LIMBS DENSE WITH RED BERRIES AND THEN A SHAPE ACHINGLY FAMILIAR CHILD-SIZED SHOCKINGLY STILL
